title: Alphaville
creator_credit: André Michelin, Jean-Luc Godard, Chaumiane, Athos Films and Filmstudio
brief_description: In his version of a futuristic dystopia, Jean-Luc Godard embraces a tech-noir aesthetic where human beings have become robotic slaves to technology, deprived of individuality and independent thought.

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

creator_credit_for_label: André Michelin, Jean-Luc Godard, Chaumiane, Athos Films and Filmstudio
description: An American private-eye arrives in Alphaville, a futuristic city on another planet which is ruled by an evil scientist named Von Braun, who has outlawed love and self-expression.
description_for_label: An American private-eye arrives in Alphaville, a futuristic city on another planet which is ruled by an evil scientist named Von Braun, who has outlawed love and self-expression.
